events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and refund due to sizing issues.
This case was assigned to customer service agent Susan Lee for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'd be happy to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket? This will help us process your return quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and hasnâ€™t been worn.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your return experience.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your help, everything went smoothly.
We are glad to hear that. We are closing your case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
